name: Lisa
title: "Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa
desc: Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Lisa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Lightning Touch
skills.desc:
Deals 1 Electro DMG:
If this Skill is a Charged Attack: Attach Conductive to the opponent's active character.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.desc: Deals 2 Electro DMG. If Conductive is not attached to the opponent's active character, Conductive will be attached.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.desc: Deals 2 Electro DMG, summons Lightning Rose.
